item.title: Excel String Cleaner Add-In
item.description: Here is a free Excel Add-In to clean dirty text the easy way! Back Story I have had to make several text cleaning functionalities for the front-end of Excel lately due banking entries, randomized strings, you name it. I thought, why not just build an Add-In I can install in any workbook that needs it? Also, I figured you guys could use it since there doesnâ€™t seem to be any Excel function like this.
